summary: For those who can't run ENBs and enjoy getting drunk, just like me.
descriptionHtml:
[b][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]Before anything else...[/font]
[size=3]THX TO ELSOPA FOR ANSWERING MY SILLY MSGS AND ALLOWING ME TO USE HIS ICBINE 3 AS THE BASE OF THIS PRESET.
[/size]
[size=3]This is a SWEETFX  preset with modified shaders that won't burn even my potatoe machine and yours.
[/size][size=4]Pics and Videos are welcome here :)[/size]
[size=6]
[/size][size=6][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]0 ~ 4 FPS LOSS ON SOME AREAS[/font]
[/size]
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/70929-0-1446044056.jpg[/img]

[size=6]REQUIREMENTS[/size]
[size=2]IT'S RECOMMENDED THAT YOU USE THOSE MODS ALONG FOR THE DRUNKEST EFFECT

[/size][list]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13531/?]Ultra Realistic World Lightning (Normal if using Purity or WAO, Dark if using CoT)[/url][/size]
[/list][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]
[/size][/font][list]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50855/?]Shadows (for interior lightning)[/url][/size]
[/list][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]
[/size][/font][list]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13049/?]IMAGINATOR (for saturation and color tweaking)[/url][/size]
[/list][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]
[/size][/font][list]
[*][size=3][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12525/]Dynavision (for DOF)[/url][/b][/size]
[size=3]
[/size][/list][/b][b]INSTALLATION[/b][b]
[list]
[*][b]Turn your antialiasing OFF (this preset uses a SMAA, which is lighter)[/b]
[*][b]Install the required mods if you want[/b]
[*][b]Copy the files to where the TESV.exe is[/b]
[*][b]Go to the Imagintor MCMenu and set it like this:[/b]
[/list][/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/jFu1Mqe.jpg[/img]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=5][b]
AND
[/b][/size][/font]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/k5ps2EL.jpg[/img]




[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=6][b]COMPATIBILITY[/b][/size][/font]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38649/?][b]ENBOOST[/b][/url]
[list]
[*]Install ENBoost according to the directions on its description.
[*]Extract the files from this mods archive to a folder on your desktop.
[*]Rename the d3d9.dll file from this to something like d3d9_sweetfx.dll.
[*]Open your enblocal.ini file from ENBoost with Notepad or Notepad++ replace the [PROXY] section with this:
[/list][PROXY]
EnableProxyLibrary=true
InitProxyFunctions=true
ProxyLibrary=d3d9_sweetfx.dll (or whatever you renamed the SweetFX .dll to)

[list]
[*]Copy the contents of the extracted folder on your desktop with the renamed .dll to your Skyrim folder as you would installing the mod normally.
[/list]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15123/?][b]HIALGOBOOST[/b][/url]
Hialgoboost newest version does not need a proxy anymore :)


[b]Hope you guys don't throw rocks on me for this :)[/b]
[size=3][b]

[/b][/size][/font][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3][b]
[/b][/size][/font]
author: kovak22
